MEntity.description: MEntity represents an entity that describes the common set of attributes shared by all concrete entities (e.g. Resource, Service, ..) in the Entity Inventory.

startDate.description: A date time( DateTime). The date from which the entity is effective

endDate.description: A date time( DateTime). The date till the entity is effective

isBundle.description: isBundle determines whether an entity represents a single entity (false), or a bundle of entities(true).

isExternal.description: isExternal determines whether an entity represents an external entity in the inventory.

status.description: The life cycle state of the entity.

statusChangeDate.description: A date time( DateTime). The date that the entity status changed

name.description: A string used to give a name to the entity

context.description: A string used to give a context to the entity

version.description: A field that identifies the specific version of an instance of an entity.

entityRelationship.description: A list of entities related to this entity

attachment.description: Attachments that may be of relevance to this entity, such as picture, document, media
